p: Next, Tafel analysis was carried out providing insight into the mechanism of oxygen adsorption on the surface of two studied samples. ORR Tafel slopes, b, were determined from the mass transfer-corrected j vs. E curves at 1600 rpm, Figure 5d. It has been pointed out that choosing a suitable current range relative to the value of the limiting steady-state current for Tafel analysis might provide more reliable results than choosing a suitable potential range [ 48]. The suitable current typically lies in the 10â€“80% range of the limiting current (upon mass-transfer correction). Still, the authors opted for defining a potential range for Tafel analysis as well-defined limiting current densities were not reached.
